name: piercing_line
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool barpatterns.
Tool description: Screener for stock candlestick patterns & indicator signals. 
Screening 21 candlestick patterns & 6 indicator signals (supertrend, macd, rsi)
API description: Returns a list of stocks that have a Piercing Line signal from the BarPatterns API.

page.description: The page number for paginated results. Defaults to 1.
